import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import UserService from '../../../service/UserService' import AppService from '../../../service/AppService' import './profile.css' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import ItemCard from './Item-card' import Spinner from '../../ui/Spinner' class Profile extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { items: undefined, name: '', username: '', showModal: false } this.userService = new UserService() this.AppService = new AppService() } updateItemList = () => { this.appService .getAllItems() .then(response => { console.log('all items', response.data) this.setState({ items: response.data }) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } updateItemList = () => { this.appService .getAllItems() .then(response => { console.log('all items', response.data) this.setState({ items: response.data }) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } updateCurrentState = data => { //where, when?? this.setState({ name: data.name || "", username: data.username || "" }) } handleInputChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } handleFormSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() this.userService .editUser(this.props.loggedInUser.id, this.state) //??? .then(response => { this.props.setTheUser(response.data) //???? this.props.handleToast(true, 'Edited successfully') this.props.history.push('/user') }) .catch(err => console.log(err.response.data.message)) // Error handling } handleModal = status => this.setState({ showModal: status }) render() { console.log('profile page props', this.props) console.log('props de usuario', this.props.loggedInUser) return ( <>

Hi, {this.props.loggedInUser.name}!



These are your listed items:



{ !this.state.items ? : {this.state.items.map(elm => (elm.foundBy === this.props.loggedInUser._id) ? : null )} }
this.handleModal(false)}>

) } } export default Profile
